    <script>
        // Critical JS (NO BABEL IN HERE!)
        var timesRun = 0;
        var interval = setInterval(function() {
            timesRun++;
        var cssStatus = window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('body'), '::after').getPropertyValue('content').replace(/\"/g, '');
        if (cssStatus === 'main-css-ready' || timesRun === 300) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('body--loading');
            var event = document.createEvent('Event');
            event.initEvent('srf.styles.loaded', true, true);
            window.dispatchEvent(event);
        }
      }, 100);
    </script>
</head>
<body  class="body--loading" data-bu="srf" data-representation="web" >

  <div style="display:none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><g id="srf-logo" fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd"><path fill="#AF001D" d="M0 32h48V0H0z"/><g fill="#FFFFFF"><path d="M5.891 21.108l-.282 1.811c-.047.354.118.495.423.542.683.094 2.401.211 4.07.211 3.743 0 6.472-1.223 6.472-4.705 0-2.048-.894-3.577-4-4.377l-1.741-.447c-1.176-.306-1.718-.682-1.718-1.553 0-1.223 1.13-1.458 2.211-1.458 1.46 0 2.942.117 3.53.164.612.047.776-.024.87-.541l.284-1.765c.047-.353-.119-.494-.424-.54-.683-.095-2.189-.213-4.095-.213-3.883 0-5.764 1.694-5.764 4.377 0 2.423 1.317 3.859 3.6 4.446l1.741.448c1.435.377 2.047.8 2.047 1.694 0 1.317-.894 1.553-3.06 1.553-.987 0-2.704-.141-3.292-.188-.613-.048-.777.023-.872.54M36.246 14.52v-3.2h6.165c.47 0 .612-.166.612-.636V9.037c0-.47-.141-.635-.612-.635h-8.942c-.47 0-.612.164-.612.635v13.86c0 .47.142.635.612.635h2.165c.47 0 .612-.165.612-.636v-5.459h5.6c.47 0 .612-.164.612-.635v-1.647c0-.47-.142-.635-.612-.635h-5.6zM24.092 15.72l-.236.988c-.07.282-.094.423-.094.517 0 .236.07.424.236.706l2.8 5.036c.235.4.423.565.988.565h2.565c.329 0 .73-.212.353-.8l-3.436-5.695c1.153-.73 2.448-1.765 2.448-4.047 0-2.941-1.648-4.588-5.271-4.588h-5.248c-.471 0-.612.164-.612.635v13.86c0 .47.141.635.612.635h2.165c.47 0 .612-.165.612-.636V11.201h2.235c1.412 0 2.094.519 2.094 1.836 0 1.2-.54 1.577-1.082 1.812-.682.282-.918-.024-1.13.87"/></g></g></svg></div>

     data-date-modified="2020-10-17T16:36:00+02:00"
     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/meteo/meteo-stories/foehn-foehn-im-herbst-2020-praktisch-inexistent"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19083040"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-4"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">

                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />

                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Föhn
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">Föhn im Herbst 2020: praktisch inexistent</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Der September war ein Totalausfall und im Oktober gabs erst einmal Föhn.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video"
    
>
            Mit Video
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
            <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">
            
<div data-date-published="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-date-modified="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/news/schweiz/alternative-waehrungen-usterbatzen-topp-eulachtaler-flop"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19079245"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-5"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
                                <img class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp"
                                         alt title                                          aria-hidden="true"
                                         data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg"
                                         data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/f187428.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/f187428.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/f187428.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/f187428.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/f187428.jpg 1280w"
                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Alternative Währungen
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">«Usterbatzen» topp – «Eulachtaler» Flop</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Sie sollen die lokale Wirtschaft stützen und in der Region zirkulieren. Doch alternative Währungen haben es schwer.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--audio"
    
>
            Mit Audio
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
    </ul>

  <h3 class="h-offscreen">Suche</h3>
  <div class="search-header__search">
    <form autocomplete="off"
      class="search  js-search  "
              data-typeahead-url="/news/a2z/autocomplete.json"
            data-suggestion-history=true
      action="/suche"
      role="search"
              >
      
  <div class="search-wrapper">
    <div class="search__input--wrapper">
      <div class="search__icon"></div>

      <label class="search__label">
        <span class="h-offscreen">Suche, zeigt beim Tippen Resultate an</span>
        <input class="search__input js-search-input"
               name="q"
               type="text"
               placeholder="Suchen"
               data-result-alert-text="Resultate für"
               data-referrer-track="srg_mod1=search_burger_navigation"
             
               autocomplete="off"
               maxlength="128"
                              >
                    </label>

            <a href="#" class="search__close js-search-close" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
      <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark svg-icon--clear-input"></span>
      </a>
      <button type="submit"
              class="h-offscreen"
              tabindex="-1"
              aria-hidden="true">Suchen</button>
    </div>
    <ul class="search__results js-search-results"
        aria-live="polite"
        aria-relevant="additions">
    </ul>
  </div>
  
</form>
  </div>

  <div class="search-header__close-wrapper">
    
<button
          class="button  button--transparent button--align-left button--no-spacing button--icon-button button--mixed-case button--no-text-on-mobile search-header__close js-close-modal"
  
  >

  <span class="h-offscreen">Menü schliessen</span>

  <span class="button-wrapper button-wrapper--svg-icon" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation">
          <span class="button-icon">
        <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark"></span>
      </span>
    
        
            <span class="button-text">Schliessen</span>

  </div>

    data-analytics-webtrekk-survey-gizmo-value-object="{&quot;params&quot;:{&quot;content_title_pretty&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_category_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;content_category_2&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_3&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_4&quot;:null,&quot;content_id&quot;:null,&quot;content_page_type&quot;:&quot;Fehlerseite&quot;,&quot;content_page_elements&quot;:null,&quot;content_tags_subject&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_datetime_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_title&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_publication_version&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;navigation_bu_distributer&quot;:&quot;SRF&quot;,&quot;navigation_property_type&quot;:&quot;web&quot;,&quot;navigation_app_site_name&quot;:&quot;srf.ch&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_2&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_3&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_4&quot;:null,&quot;http_status_code&quot;:&quot;200&quot;}}"
    data-analytics-webtrekk-custom-data=""
    data-analytics-survey-gizmo-beacon="NDk0MzExLTMwZTBmOTQxMWM2ZWFiZmRhMmRhMDQ5MDViOTM1YjFiYTI0NWQxODZlY2Q3ZjMwYTM1"
    data-swiss-media-data-hub="{&quot;track_noscript_url&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com\/p?c1=2&amp;c2=6036016&amp;cv=2.0&amp;cj=1&quot;,&quot;track_domain&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com&quot;,&quot;track_c1&quot;:2,&quot;track_c2&quot;:6036016}"

                <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/runtime.b4b5d4d4.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/0.b30d63e6.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/1.ab05da6d.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/page.09dfcbf7.js"></script>
                
<script type='text/javascript'>

    function fetchMetaData() {
        var webtrekk = {"content_title_pretty":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_category_1":"HTTP Status Page","content_category_2":null,"content_category_3":null,"content_category_4":null,"content_id":null,"content_page_type":"Fehlerseite","content_page_elements":null,"content_tags_subject":null,"content_publication_date":null,"content_publication_date_concatenated":null,"content_publication_time":null,"content_publication_time_concatenated":null,"content_publication_datetime_concatenated":null,"content_title":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_publication_version":"1"},
            weburl = 'https://www.srf.ch/404',
            shortLead = '';

        if (webtrekk && typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            var storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('srf:analytics:mod:app'));
            webtrekk.srg_mod1 = getModData(storedData, 'mod1');
            webtrekk.srg_mod2 = getModData(storedData, 'mod2');
            webtrekk.srg_mod3 = getModData(storedData, 'mod3');
            webtrekk.srg_mod4 = getModData(storedData, 'mod4');
            localStorage.removeItem('srf:analytics:mod:app');
            Object.keys(webtrekk).forEach(function (key) {
                (webtrekk[key] === 'undefined') && delete webtrekk[key];
            })
        }

        nativebridge.onMetadataRetrieved(JSON.stringify({
            'weburl': weburl,
            'title': webtrekk.content_title_pretty,
            'shortLead': shortLead,
            'type': webtrekk.content_page_type,
            'webtrekk': webtrekk
        }));

        nativebridge.fetchMetaDataWasCalled = true;
    }

    function getModData(storedData, key) {
        var result = 'undefined';
        if (storedData) {
            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_' + key];
            } else if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srf_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srf_' + key];
            }

            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_override_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_override_' + key];
            }
        }

        return decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(result)).replace('+', ' ');
    }

    function setDeviceInfo(data) {
        if (typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            try {
                localStorage.setItem('sg_app_data', JSON.stringify(data));
                var event = new CustomEvent("setDeviceInfo", {});
                document.dispatchEvent(event);
            } catch (e) {
            }
        }
    }
</script>

    <script>
        // Critical JS (NO BABEL IN HERE!)
        var timesRun = 0;
        var interval = setInterval(function() {
            timesRun++;
        var cssStatus = window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('body'), '::after').getPropertyValue('content').replace(/\"/g, '');
        if (cssStatus === 'main-css-ready' || timesRun === 300) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('body--loading');
            var event = document.createEvent('Event');
            event.initEvent('srf.styles.loaded', true, true);
            window.dispatchEvent(event);
        }
      }, 100);
    </script>

     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/meteo/meteo-stories/foehn-foehn-im-herbst-2020-praktisch-inexistent"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19083040"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-4"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">

                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />

                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Föhn
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">Föhn im Herbst 2020: praktisch inexistent</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Der September war ein Totalausfall und im Oktober gabs erst einmal Föhn.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video"
    
>
            Mit Video
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
            <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">
            
<div data-date-published="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-date-modified="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/news/schweiz/alternative-waehrungen-usterbatzen-topp-eulachtaler-flop"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19079245"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-5"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
                                <img class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp"
                                         alt title                                          aria-hidden="true"
                                         data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg"
                                         data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/f187428.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/f187428.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/f187428.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/f187428.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/f187428.jpg 1280w"
                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Alternative Währungen
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">«Usterbatzen» topp – «Eulachtaler» Flop</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Sie sollen die lokale Wirtschaft stützen und in der Region zirkulieren. Doch alternative Währungen haben es schwer.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--audio"
    
>
            Mit Audio
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
    </ul>

  <h3 class="h-offscreen">Suche</h3>
  <div class="search-header__search">
    <form autocomplete="off"
      class="search  js-search  "
              data-typeahead-url="/news/a2z/autocomplete.json"
            data-suggestion-history=true
      action="/suche"
      role="search"
              >
      
  <div class="search-wrapper">
    <div class="search__input--wrapper">
      <div class="search__icon"></div>

      <label class="search__label">
        <span class="h-offscreen">Suche, zeigt beim Tippen Resultate an</span>
        <input class="search__input js-search-input"
               name="q"
               type="text"
               placeholder="Suchen"
               data-result-alert-text="Resultate für"
               data-referrer-track="srg_mod1=search_burger_navigation"
             
               autocomplete="off"
               maxlength="128"
                              >
                    </label>

            <a href="#" class="search__close js-search-close" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
      <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark svg-icon--clear-input"></span>
      </a>
      <button type="submit"
              class="h-offscreen"
              tabindex="-1"
              aria-hidden="true">Suchen</button>
    </div>
    <ul class="search__results js-search-results"
        aria-live="polite"
        aria-relevant="additions">
    </ul>
  </div>
  
</form>
  </div>

  <div class="search-header__close-wrapper">
    
<button
          class="button  button--transparent button--align-left button--no-spacing button--icon-button button--mixed-case button--no-text-on-mobile search-header__close js-close-modal"
  
  >

  <span class="h-offscreen">Menü schliessen</span>

  <span class="button-wrapper button-wrapper--svg-icon" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation">
          <span class="button-icon">
        <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark"></span>
      </span>
    
        
            <span class="button-text">Schliessen</span>

  </div>

    data-analytics-webtrekk-survey-gizmo-value-object="{&quot;params&quot;:{&quot;content_title_pretty&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_category_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;content_category_2&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_3&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_4&quot;:null,&quot;content_id&quot;:null,&quot;content_page_type&quot;:&quot;Fehlerseite&quot;,&quot;content_page_elements&quot;:null,&quot;content_tags_subject&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_datetime_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_title&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_publication_version&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;navigation_bu_distributer&quot;:&quot;SRF&quot;,&quot;navigation_property_type&quot;:&quot;web&quot;,&quot;navigation_app_site_name&quot;:&quot;srf.ch&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_2&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_3&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_4&quot;:null,&quot;http_status_code&quot;:&quot;200&quot;}}"
    data-analytics-webtrekk-custom-data=""
    data-analytics-survey-gizmo-beacon="NDk0MzExLTMwZTBmOTQxMWM2ZWFiZmRhMmRhMDQ5MDViOTM1YjFiYTI0NWQxODZlY2Q3ZjMwYTM1"
    data-swiss-media-data-hub="{&quot;track_noscript_url&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com\/p?c1=2&amp;c2=6036016&amp;cv=2.0&amp;cj=1&quot;,&quot;track_domain&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com&quot;,&quot;track_c1&quot;:2,&quot;track_c2&quot;:6036016}"

                <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/runtime.b4b5d4d4.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/0.b30d63e6.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/1.ab05da6d.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/page.09dfcbf7.js"></script>
                
<script type='text/javascript'>

    function fetchMetaData() {
        var webtrekk = {"content_title_pretty":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_category_1":"HTTP Status Page","content_category_2":null,"content_category_3":null,"content_category_4":null,"content_id":null,"content_page_type":"Fehlerseite","content_page_elements":null,"content_tags_subject":null,"content_publication_date":null,"content_publication_date_concatenated":null,"content_publication_time":null,"content_publication_time_concatenated":null,"content_publication_datetime_concatenated":null,"content_title":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_publication_version":"1"},
            weburl = 'https://www.srf.ch/404',
            shortLead = '';

        if (webtrekk && typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            var storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('srf:analytics:mod:app'));
            webtrekk.srg_mod1 = getModData(storedData, 'mod1');
            webtrekk.srg_mod2 = getModData(storedData, 'mod2');
            webtrekk.srg_mod3 = getModData(storedData, 'mod3');
            webtrekk.srg_mod4 = getModData(storedData, 'mod4');
            localStorage.removeItem('srf:analytics:mod:app');
            Object.keys(webtrekk).forEach(function (key) {
                (webtrekk[key] === 'undefined') && delete webtrekk[key];
            })
        }

        nativebridge.onMetadataRetrieved(JSON.stringify({
            'weburl': weburl,
            'title': webtrekk.content_title_pretty,
            'shortLead': shortLead,
            'type': webtrekk.content_page_type,
            'webtrekk': webtrekk
        }));

        nativebridge.fetchMetaDataWasCalled = true;
    }

    function getModData(storedData, key) {
        var result = 'undefined';
        if (storedData) {
            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_' + key];
            } else if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srf_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srf_' + key];
            }

            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_override_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_override_' + key];
            }
        }

        return decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(result)).replace('+', ' ');
    }

    function setDeviceInfo(data) {
        if (typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            try {
                localStorage.setItem('sg_app_data', JSON.stringify(data));
                var event = new CustomEvent("setDeviceInfo", {});
                document.dispatchEvent(event);
            } catch (e) {
            }
        }
    }
</script>

    <script>
        // Critical JS (NO BABEL IN HERE!)
        var timesRun = 0;
        var interval = setInterval(function() {
            timesRun++;
        var cssStatus = window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('body'), '::after').getPropertyValue('content').replace(/\"/g, '');
        if (cssStatus === 'main-css-ready' || timesRun === 300) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('body--loading');
            var event = document.createEvent('Event');
            event.initEvent('srf.styles.loaded', true, true);
            window.dispatchEvent(event);
        }
      }, 100);
    </script>

     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/meteo/meteo-stories/foehn-foehn-im-herbst-2020-praktisch-inexistent"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19083040"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-4"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">

                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />

                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Föhn
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">Föhn im Herbst 2020: praktisch inexistent</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Der September war ein Totalausfall und im Oktober gabs erst einmal Föhn.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video"
    
>
            Mit Video
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
            <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">
            
<div data-date-published="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-date-modified="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/news/schweiz/alternative-waehrungen-usterbatzen-topp-eulachtaler-flop"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19079245"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-5"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
                                <img class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp"
                                         alt title                                          aria-hidden="true"
                                         data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg"
                                         data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/f187428.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/f187428.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/f187428.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/f187428.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/f187428.jpg 1280w"
                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Alternative Währungen
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">«Usterbatzen» topp – «Eulachtaler» Flop</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Sie sollen die lokale Wirtschaft stützen und in der Region zirkulieren. Doch alternative Währungen haben es schwer.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--audio"
    
>
            Mit Audio
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
    </ul>

  <h3 class="h-offscreen">Suche</h3>
  <div class="search-header__search">
    <form autocomplete="off"
      class="search  js-search  "
              data-typeahead-url="/news/a2z/autocomplete.json"
            data-suggestion-history=true
      action="/suche"
      role="search"
              >
      
  <div class="search-wrapper">
    <div class="search__input--wrapper">
      <div class="search__icon"></div>

      <label class="search__label">
        <span class="h-offscreen">Suche, zeigt beim Tippen Resultate an</span>
        <input class="search__input js-search-input"
               name="q"
               type="text"
               placeholder="Suchen"
               data-result-alert-text="Resultate für"
               data-referrer-track="srg_mod1=search_burger_navigation"
             
               autocomplete="off"
               maxlength="128"
                              >
                    </label>

            <a href="#" class="search__close js-search-close" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
      <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark svg-icon--clear-input"></span>
      </a>
      <button type="submit"
              class="h-offscreen"
              tabindex="-1"
              aria-hidden="true">Suchen</button>
    </div>
    <ul class="search__results js-search-results"
        aria-live="polite"
        aria-relevant="additions">
    </ul>
  </div>
  
</form>
  </div>

  <div class="search-header__close-wrapper">
    
<button
          class="button  button--transparent button--align-left button--no-spacing button--icon-button button--mixed-case button--no-text-on-mobile search-header__close js-close-modal"
  
  >

  <span class="h-offscreen">Menü schliessen</span>

  <span class="button-wrapper button-wrapper--svg-icon" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation">
          <span class="button-icon">
        <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark"></span>
      </span>
    
        
            <span class="button-text">Schliessen</span>

  </div>

    data-analytics-webtrekk-survey-gizmo-value-object="{&quot;params&quot;:{&quot;content_title_pretty&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_category_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;content_category_2&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_3&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_4&quot;:null,&quot;content_id&quot;:null,&quot;content_page_type&quot;:&quot;Fehlerseite&quot;,&quot;content_page_elements&quot;:null,&quot;content_tags_subject&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_datetime_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_title&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_publication_version&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;navigation_bu_distributer&quot;:&quot;SRF&quot;,&quot;navigation_property_type&quot;:&quot;web&quot;,&quot;navigation_app_site_name&quot;:&quot;srf.ch&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_2&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_3&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_4&quot;:null,&quot;http_status_code&quot;:&quot;200&quot;}}"
    data-analytics-webtrekk-custom-data=""
    data-analytics-survey-gizmo-beacon="NDk0MzExLTMwZTBmOTQxMWM2ZWFiZmRhMmRhMDQ5MDViOTM1YjFiYTI0NWQxODZlY2Q3ZjMwYTM1"
    data-swiss-media-data-hub="{&quot;track_noscript_url&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com\/p?c1=2&amp;c2=6036016&amp;cv=2.0&amp;cj=1&quot;,&quot;track_domain&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com&quot;,&quot;track_c1&quot;:2,&quot;track_c2&quot;:6036016}"

                <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/runtime.b4b5d4d4.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/0.b30d63e6.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/1.ab05da6d.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/page.09dfcbf7.js"></script>
                
<script type='text/javascript'>

    function fetchMetaData() {
        var webtrekk = {"content_title_pretty":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_category_1":"HTTP Status Page","content_category_2":null,"content_category_3":null,"content_category_4":null,"content_id":null,"content_page_type":"Fehlerseite","content_page_elements":null,"content_tags_subject":null,"content_publication_date":null,"content_publication_date_concatenated":null,"content_publication_time":null,"content_publication_time_concatenated":null,"content_publication_datetime_concatenated":null,"content_title":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_publication_version":"1"},
            weburl = 'https://www.srf.ch/404',
            shortLead = '';

        if (webtrekk && typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            var storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('srf:analytics:mod:app'));
            webtrekk.srg_mod1 = getModData(storedData, 'mod1');
            webtrekk.srg_mod2 = getModData(storedData, 'mod2');
            webtrekk.srg_mod3 = getModData(storedData, 'mod3');
            webtrekk.srg_mod4 = getModData(storedData, 'mod4');
            localStorage.removeItem('srf:analytics:mod:app');
            Object.keys(webtrekk).forEach(function (key) {
                (webtrekk[key] === 'undefined') && delete webtrekk[key];
            })
        }

        nativebridge.onMetadataRetrieved(JSON.stringify({
            'weburl': weburl,
            'title': webtrekk.content_title_pretty,
            'shortLead': shortLead,
            'type': webtrekk.content_page_type,
            'webtrekk': webtrekk
        }));

        nativebridge.fetchMetaDataWasCalled = true;
    }

    function getModData(storedData, key) {
        var result = 'undefined';
        if (storedData) {
            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_' + key];
            } else if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srf_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srf_' + key];
            }

            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_override_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_override_' + key];
            }
        }

        return decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(result)).replace('+', ' ');
    }

    function setDeviceInfo(data) {
        if (typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            try {
                localStorage.setItem('sg_app_data', JSON.stringify(data));
                var event = new CustomEvent("setDeviceInfo", {});
                document.dispatchEvent(event);
            } catch (e) {
            }
        }
    }
</script>

    <script>
        // Critical JS (NO BABEL IN HERE!)
        var timesRun = 0;
        var interval = setInterval(function() {
            timesRun++;
        var cssStatus = window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('body'), '::after').getPropertyValue('content').replace(/\"/g, '');
        if (cssStatus === 'main-css-ready' || timesRun === 300) {
            clearInterval(interval);
            document.querySelector('body').classList.remove('body--loading');
            var event = document.createEvent('Event');
            event.initEvent('srf.styles.loaded', true, true);
            window.dispatchEvent(event);
        }
      }, 100);
    </script>

     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/meteo/meteo-stories/foehn-foehn-im-herbst-2020-praktisch-inexistent"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19083040"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-4"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">

                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />

                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Föhn
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">Föhn im Herbst 2020: praktisch inexistent</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Der September war ein Totalausfall und im Oktober gabs erst einmal Föhn.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--video"
    
>
            Mit Video
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
            <li class="collection__teaser-item swipeable-area__item js-swipeable-area-item">
            
<div data-date-published="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-date-modified="2020-10-17T22:22:00+02:00"
     data-source="urn:srf:landingpage:4267482"
     class="js-teaser js-teaser-data teaser teaser--size-m  "
     >

        <a class="teaser__main js-teaser__main "
       href="/news/schweiz/alternative-waehrungen-usterbatzen-topp-eulachtaler-flop"
              data-urn="urn:srf:article:19079245"
       data-referrer-track="srg_mod4=teaser-size-m-link-0-pos-5"
       >
    
        
                                <div class="ratio-wrapper teaser__medium-wrapper">
                <div class="ratio ratio--16-9">
                                            <div class="teaser__medium">
                            <div class="image image--media-still-dynamic">
                                <img class="js-lazyload js-lazyload-webp"
                                         alt title                                          aria-hidden="true"
                                         data-src="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg"
                                         data-srcset="https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/160ws/f187428.jpg 160w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/320ws/f187428.jpg 320w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/480ws/f187428.jpg 480w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/640ws/f187428.jpg 640w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/960ws/f187428.jpg 960w, https://www.srf.ch/static/cms/images/1280ws/f187428.jpg 1280w"
                                         data-sizes="(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 33.4vw"
                                    />
                            </div>
                        </div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
                    
        <div class="teaser__content" role="text">                                             
<div class="teaser__kicker">
                <span class="teaser__kicker-text">
            Alternative Währungen
        </span>
    </div>
                <span class="teaser__title">«Usterbatzen» topp – «Eulachtaler» Flop</span>
            
                                                <p class="teaser__lead">Sie sollen die lokale Wirtschaft stützen und in der Region zirkulieren. Doch alternative Währungen haben es schwer.</p>
                
                                                
                <div class="teaser__info-wrapper   js-teaser-info-wrapper  ">
                    
                        <span
    class="teaser-info js-teaser-info-state teaser-info--audio"
    
>
            Mit Audio
    </span>                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </a>

                </div>

        </li>
    </ul>

  <h3 class="h-offscreen">Suche</h3>
  <div class="search-header__search">
    <form autocomplete="off"
      class="search  js-search  "
              data-typeahead-url="/news/a2z/autocomplete.json"
            data-suggestion-history=true
      action="/suche"
      role="search"
              >
      
  <div class="search-wrapper">
    <div class="search__input--wrapper">
      <div class="search__icon"></div>

      <label class="search__label">
        <span class="h-offscreen">Suche, zeigt beim Tippen Resultate an</span>
        <input class="search__input js-search-input"
               name="q"
               type="text"
               placeholder="Suchen"
               data-result-alert-text="Resultate für"
               data-referrer-track="srg_mod1=search_burger_navigation"
             
               autocomplete="off"
               maxlength="128"
                              >
                    </label>

            <a href="#" class="search__close js-search-close" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
      <span class="svg-icon svg-icon--close-dark svg-icon--clear-input"></span>
      </a>
      <button type="submit"
              class="h-offscreen"
              tabindex="-1"
              aria-hidden="true">Suchen</button>
    </div>
    <ul class="search__results js-search-results"
        aria-live="polite"
        aria-relevant="additions">
    </ul>
  </div>
  
</form>
  </div>

  <div class="search-header__close-wrapper">
    
<button
          class="button  button--transparent button--align-left button--no-spacing button--icon-button button--mixed-case button--no-text-on-mobile search-header__close js-close-modal"
  
  >

  <span class="h-offscreen">Menü schliessen</span>

  <span class="button-wrapper button-wrapper--svg-icon" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation">

    data-analytics-webtrekk-survey-gizmo-value-object="{&quot;params&quot;:{&quot;content_title_pretty&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_category_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;content_category_2&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_3&quot;:null,&quot;content_category_4&quot;:null,&quot;content_id&quot;:null,&quot;content_page_type&quot;:&quot;Fehlerseite&quot;,&quot;content_page_elements&quot;:null,&quot;content_tags_subject&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_date_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_time_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_publication_datetime_concatenated&quot;:null,&quot;content_title&quot;:&quot;Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden&quot;,&quot;content_publication_version&quot;:&quot;1&quot;,&quot;navigation_bu_distributer&quot;:&quot;SRF&quot;,&quot;navigation_property_type&quot;:&quot;web&quot;,&quot;navigation_app_site_name&quot;:&quot;srf.ch&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_1&quot;:&quot;HTTP Status Page&quot;,&quot;navigation_level_2&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_3&quot;:null,&quot;navigation_level_4&quot;:null,&quot;http_status_code&quot;:&quot;200&quot;}}"
    data-analytics-webtrekk-custom-data=""
    data-analytics-survey-gizmo-beacon="NDk0MzExLTMwZTBmOTQxMWM2ZWFiZmRhMmRhMDQ5MDViOTM1YjFiYTI0NWQxODZlY2Q3ZjMwYTM1"
    data-swiss-media-data-hub="{&quot;track_noscript_url&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com\/p?c1=2&amp;c2=6036016&amp;cv=2.0&amp;cj=1&quot;,&quot;track_domain&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/sb.scorecardresearch.com&quot;,&quot;track_c1&quot;:2,&quot;track_c2&quot;:6036016}"

                <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/runtime.b4b5d4d4.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/0.b30d63e6.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/1.ab05da6d.js"></script>
            <script async type="text/javascript" src="/var/storage/assets/webpack/page.09dfcbf7.js"></script>
                
<script type='text/javascript'>

    function fetchMetaData() {
        var webtrekk = {"content_title_pretty":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_category_1":"HTTP Status Page","content_category_2":null,"content_category_3":null,"content_category_4":null,"content_id":null,"content_page_type":"Fehlerseite","content_page_elements":null,"content_tags_subject":null,"content_publication_date":null,"content_publication_date_concatenated":null,"content_publication_time":null,"content_publication_time_concatenated":null,"content_publication_datetime_concatenated":null,"content_title":"Diese Seite wurde nicht gefunden","content_publication_version":"1"},
            weburl = 'https://www.srf.ch/404',
            shortLead = '';

        if (webtrekk && typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            var storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('srf:analytics:mod:app'));
            webtrekk.srg_mod1 = getModData(storedData, 'mod1');
            webtrekk.srg_mod2 = getModData(storedData, 'mod2');
            webtrekk.srg_mod3 = getModData(storedData, 'mod3');
            webtrekk.srg_mod4 = getModData(storedData, 'mod4');
            localStorage.removeItem('srf:analytics:mod:app');
            Object.keys(webtrekk).forEach(function (key) {
                (webtrekk[key] === 'undefined') && delete webtrekk[key];
            })
        }

        nativebridge.onMetadataRetrieved(JSON.stringify({
            'weburl': weburl,
            'title': webtrekk.content_title_pretty,
            'shortLead': shortLead,
            'type': webtrekk.content_page_type,
            'webtrekk': webtrekk
        }));

        nativebridge.fetchMetaDataWasCalled = true;
    }

    function getModData(storedData, key) {
        var result = 'undefined';
        if (storedData) {
            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_' + key];
            } else if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srf_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srf_' + key];
            }

            if (storedData.hasOwnProperty('srg_override_' + key)) {
                result = storedData['srg_override_' + key];
            }
        }

        return decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(result)).replace('+', ' ');
    }

    function setDeviceInfo(data) {
        if (typeof localStorage === 'object') {
            try {
                localStorage.setItem('sg_app_data', JSON.stringify(data));
                var event = new CustomEvent("setDeviceInfo", {});
                document.dispatchEvent(event);
            } catch (e) {
            }
        }
    }
</script>
